message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. 80/20 seems reasonable.
I'll give you a slightly better offer. You can't do much better than this, can you?
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more. 70/30 is my best offer so far.
I'm not getting any younger, Alice. I think it's time to split it down the middle. This is my final offer.
